code: import React from'react';import'../Css/Pagination.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MAX_ITEMS=3;var MAX_LEFT=Math.max(MAX_ITEMS-1,0);var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var limit=_ref.limit,total=_ref.total,offset=_ref.offset,setOffset=_ref.setOffset;var current=offset?offset/limit+1:1;var pages=Math.ceil(total/limit);var startPage=Math.max(current-MAX_LEFT,1);var endPage=Math.min(startPage+MAX_LEFT,pages);function onPageChange(page){setOffset((page-1)*limit);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{"aria-label":"Page navigation example",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"pagination justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{class:"page-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"page-link",onClick:function onClick(){return onPageChange(current-1);},disabled:current===1,children:"Anterior"})}),Array.from({length:MAX_ITEMS}).map(function(_,index){return index+startPage;}).filter(function(page){return page<=endPage;}).map(function(page){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{class:"page-link",href:"#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"page-link",href:"#",onClick:function onClick(){return onPageChange(page);},className:page===current?'pagination__item--active':null,children:page})},page);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{class:"page-link",href:"#",onClick:function onClick(){return onPageChange(current+1);},disabled:current===pages,children:"Pr\xF3xima"})})]})});};export default Pagination;
